task.title: Apply an ignored zone to all baseline images
task.shortdesc: Adding an ignored zone to the same area in multiple baseline images could become time-consuming if there are more than one baseline image. With TestOps Visual Testing, you can apply an ignored zone to multiple baseline images in a baseline collection.

context.p: To apply an ignored zone to all baseline images within one baseline collection, follow these steps:

step.stepresult: The ignored zone is displayed in purple.

step.cmd: Click on the ignored zone, then select the Apply the zone to all images icon.

image.alt: apply ignored zone to all images icon

step.stepresult: You then see the Acknowledgement pop-up box.ignored-zone-acknowledgement-popup
The ignored zone is now displayed in yellow because it has been applied to all other baseline images in the baseline collection.ignored zone applied to all images

step.cmd: Click Save to temporarily save the configuration.
Click Save Changes on the top right corner to permanently save the configuration.

taskbody.result: You have applied an ignored zone to all baseline images within the selected baseline collection.
